Changelog
=========

1.0.0 (2011-11-16)
-------------------

* Update MANIFEST.in (now including docs folder, txt and .mo files)
    [rbeylerian]

* Plone 4 Compatibility : Use <interface>.providedBy method instead of
  <interface>.isImplementedBy when Plone 4 is detected (keep Plone 3.2
  compatibility)
    [rbeylerian]

1.0dev (unreleased)
-------------------

- Initial release
